items.text: full on middle stump, and that's been whipped off his pads to deep square leg. They jog across for one
items.postText: Atishay: "This is such a tailor made situation for players like Imam Ul Haq and Shoaib Malik, who like to spend time in the middle and keep collections runs slowly but steadily. I see Pakistan winning this through their help. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText: Here's Mashrafe. Replacing Mehidy after two overs. Around the wicket with a wide first slip.
items.text: right on the money. Full on off stump, and defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: length ball, but wide outside off. The ball stays low, and he mistimes a cut to cover point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full ball on off stump from around the wicket. Imam takes a small stride forward, and defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: good length outside off, but angling in slightly. Too close to Imam's body for the cut, and he mistimes the shot to cover point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: swing and a miss! Wide outside off, and Imam tries to slap this square. The ball goes just over his bat, deceived by the extra pace on this occasion
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and driven straight back past the bowler's right. But mid off runs to his left and intercepts
items.postText: iamRifard : "Pakistani fans no worry, be prepared for the unexpected. Perks of being a Pakistani fan."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he leans forward to defend with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: through him! Length ball on middle, and cutting the batsman in half! The ball slides inwards after pitching, and it whizzes through the bat-pad gap. Just over the top of off stump
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he covers his off stump to defend off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he shuffles across towards the off side. Defends this with the straight bat to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he leans into the drive. Struck well, but it goes straight to cover. Five dots so far
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he works this off his pads to the leg side. Back-to-back maidens for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, but Imam misses the flick off his pads. Hits his front leg, and Mashrafe appeals but the umpire isn't interested. Would've gone down leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 leg bye

items.text: good length on off and he whips this off his hips with the angle. The ball races away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off, and he walks down the ground and then defends this straight towards the non-striker
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and Malik stays on the back foot for this one. Punches this towards mid off, and takes off for a quick single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: stays low! Length ball outside off, but angling into Imam. He tiptoes and defends this towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and Imam takes a big stride forward to defend off the front foot
items.postText: FlickForSix: "CT was a one-off, this batting line up isn't world class; they got blanked in NZ for good measure. And talk was about their stats churned in Zimbabwe where Ind sends it's A/B teams now. They needed someone like Azhar Ali, and more games to Haris Sohail."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full outside off, and Malik check-drives off the front foot. But the off-side field is packed, and the ball is intercepted by cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and this is the offcutter from Fizz. Malik leans into a front-foot defense and taps this towards the off side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and that's been caressed down the ground for a boundary! Strikes this through the ball's line, forcing Imam to spread his legs, and the ball races away past mid off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, but Malik rides the bounce and then slaps a cut-shot in front of square for back-to-back boundaries!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

items.preText: around the wicket to Malik now.
items.text: back of a length outside off, and he punches this with the angled bat. Straight to point, who has a shy at the bowler's end. Hits the stumps but Imam is in.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and he offers his bat's full face. Punched past the non-striker to mid on
items.postText: Naman: "If you remove the Zimbawe series. Fakhar Zaman has only scored 606 runs in 21 innings at an average of 28.85. Is he really that good?" -- I honestly do think that Fakhar's a better batsman outside Asia
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shoaib Malik, 1 run
